scripts.postversion: npm run build-docs && git push && git push --tags
scripts.postpublish: npm run build-docs && npm run publish-docs
scripts.build-docs: NAME="$(npm view . name)" VERSION="$(npm view . version)" && documentation readme --readme-file ./README.md --section=$NAME --name $NAME --project-version $VERSION --config documentation.yml ./src/index.js ./src/PointModel.js
scripts.publish-docs: npm run build-docs && if [ -z `git diff --name-only ./README.md` ]; then exit 0; fi && git add ./README.md && git commit -m 'Updated README API Docs' && git push
scripts.build-shared-docs: NAME="${NAME:-$npm_package_name}" VERSION="${VERSION:-$npm_package_version}" OUTPUT="${OUTPUT:-./docs}" && echo documentation build --output $OUTPUT --github --format html --name $NAME --project-version $VERSION --config documentation.yml ./src/index.js ./src/PointModel.js
